Class ImageFile

image.ImageFile

java.io.Serializable
public class ImageFile
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
Class used to hold the image in memory

      Draw between two nodes in the image.
      Parameters:
      startX - x position of the first node.
      startY - y position of the first node.
      endX - x position of the second node.
      endY - y position of the second node.
      colour - the colour to use.
